text: David Anthony Faustino (born March 3, 1974) is an American actor, rapper and radio personality, primarily known for his role as Bud Bundy on the FOX sitcom Married... with Children. He also voiced Mako in the Nickelodeon animated series The Legend of Korra. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Rappers from California Category:American radio personalities Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: David Faustino
